title: Councilmember Sawant sworn into office for third term
description: Councilmember Kshama Sawant (District 3, Central Seattle) held a ceremonial swearing-in for her third term on the Seattle City Council on Monday, Jan. 13, 2020 at Washington Hall. Sawant had her oath of office administered by Kaylah Williams, member of the Association of Flight Attendants.
